scripts.install: docker container rm -f flowthru-db; docker rmi -f flowthru-db; docker build internal/repository/pg -t flowthru-db; docker run -d --name flowthru-db -p 127.0.0.1:5432:5432 flowthru-db; docker stop flowthru-db; go get -v -t -d ./...
scripts.start: docker start flowthru-db; sleep 5; FLOWTHRU_DB_HOST=localhost FLOWTHRU_DB_PORT=5432 FLOWTHRU_DB_USER=user FLOWTHRU_DB_PASSWORD=password FLOWTHRU_DB_NAME=test go run cmd/main.go; docker stop flowthru-db
scripts.test: docker start flowthru-db; sleep 5; FLOWTHRU_DB_HOST=localhost FLOWTHRU_DB_PORT=5432 FLOWTHRU_DB_USER=user FLOWTHRU_DB_PASSWORD=password FLOWTHRU_DB_NAME=test go test -v ./...; docker stop flowthru-db
